title: Please help i can't solve the DirectX problem
body: i did not play league of legends for a week or two by now i did not play it because of the problems it's causing i start a ranked queve and all is fine then i find a game pick my champion and when the game starts to load i get the message that some DirectX problem is on my computer. Please fix this i waited at least 10 afk strikes for 20 minutes

replies.body:
Still have the same problem.

I even took  Previous AMD Driver, tried to update my DirectX und nothing helped... still not working
Thanks for the info!  Have you tried enabling the [AMD GPU Scaling](http://support.amd.com/en-us/kb-articles/Pages/UnableToSetGPUScaling.aspx)?

gpu scaling on + full repair option = worked

Up this to help others

Sorry to hear about the leaving penalties, and I'd like to help.  If you're on an AMD, we have a sticky post regarding an issue where recent drivers are causing this crash.  Rolling back to a [previous driver ](http://support.amd.com/en-us/download/desktop/previous?os=Windows%2010%20-%2064)has been known to fix this.  We've found that turning on [AMD GPU Scaling ](http://support.amd.com/en-us/kb-articles/Pages/UnableToSetGPUScaling.aspx)can act as a workaround for some players in the meantime.  Let me know if that's the case for you.
